title: tofu chocolate mousse
ingredients: 1 package silken tofu drained (12 or 14 oz)
instructions: Blend everything really well - until the chocolate is no longer grainy.
Put into storage and serving jars or bowl, then place in the fridge for a few hours. The flavor improves over time.
notes: Toppings; e.g., mint, raspberries, sliced almonds, shaved chocolate. I like storing and serving these in small mason jars.
